name: Back Into My Life
content: It's been more than a year
You are still on my mind
You're still one of a kind
That no other men can replace
Oh you're so much more than them
Every other ways for me to get you
Get you back into my life
But I don't know where you are
I don't know where to start
Or you could just live nearby
I've learnt it the hard way
They say no pain no gain
But I've gained nothing but pain
But I still can't move on
Every other ways for me to get you
Get you back into my life
But I don't know where you are
I don't know where to start
Or you could just live nearby
Be in some other girl's arms
I don't know if I can
I don't think that I can
